browse.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to look through the pages of a book, magazine etc without a particular purpose, just looking at the most interesting parts
browse.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Jon was browsing through the photographs.
browse.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to look at the goods in a shop without wanting to buy any particular thing
browse.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: tourists browsing the boutiques and souvenir stalls
The trip allows you plenty of time for browsing around the shops.
browse.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to search for information on a computer or on the Internet
browse.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: a feature that allows you to browse your hard drive and choose the graphic you want to display
browse.translation[0].definitions[3].def: if a goat, deer etc browses, it eats plants
